verses.name: 2 Kings 16:17
verses.text: And king Ahaz cut off the borders of the bases, and removed the laver from off them; and took down the sea from off the brasen oxen that were under it, and put it upon a pavement of stones.

verses.name: 2 Kings 16:18
verses.text: And the covert for the sabbath that they had built in the house, and the king’s entry without, turned he from the house of the Lord for the king of Assyria.

verses.name: 2 Kings 16:19
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Ahaz which he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
